raw_text: We use a phrase-based translation approach as described in (Zens and Ney, 2004) .The posterior probability Pr (eI1|fJ1) is modeled directly using a weighted log-linear combination of a trigram language model and various translation models: a phrase translation model and a word based lexicon model
